title: Plugging in Values
text: Plug in the required values into the function, such as $$0$$ and $$1$$. If the result is not undefined, then simplify.
speech: Plug in the required values into the function, such as  0  and  1, . If the result is not undefined, then simplify.

. If the result is not undefined, then simplify.
